summary: Adds a fully functioning Child \'Apprentice\' follower to the game who fights properly and has several sets of craftable armour.
descriptionHtml:
This Mod was created after i became frustrated trying to find a Mod to allow me to have an apprentice follow me, children in the game were always cowardly and ran.
Artemis uses the standard voice for a male child, so when not following you will sound like a normal child. Due to a lack of follower dialogue, Artemis wont speak much when following you, but he will speak during battle.
Mod works very well using UFO mod, i recommend it.


Quest will begin when a courier delivers a message to you from Constance Michel.

Mod Includes.
A small quest to rescue Artemis
A small dungeon to explore.
Artemis The Follower, a ranged combat light armour using male nord child.
3 Sets of craftable childrens armour, Elven, Glass and Dragonscale
3 lines of horrible voice acting to endure so the quest makes sense --- These are once off lines for the quest line, his regular voice is that of a standard male child in Skyrim.

**********************************************************
 - Added a version of the mod where Artemis\' name was changed to Aenar, for those who either considered Artemis non lore friendly or didn\'t like it.
author: Crowley

files.name: VanillaMod
files.changelogHtml:
Added Alternate version of mod with Artemis renamed Aenar
Decorated exterior of Durok's Hideout to make it more interesting
